/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, adding depth and context to the image. A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a human element to the urban landscape. Cars are driving on the road, indicating a busy day in the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
